original_text: Therefore shalt thou fall in the day, and the prophet also shall fall with thee in the night, and I will destroy thy mother.
korean_text: 너는 낮에 넘어지겠고 너와 함께 있는 선지자는 밤에 넘어지리라 내가 네 어머니를 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore shalt thou fall in the day
and the prophet also shall fall with thee in the night
and I will destroy thy mother
